_header: I have a young sister far beyonden the sea
Note:
Similar paradoxes are frequent; compare the Ballad of Lord Rostin’s Daughter, and The Four Sisters, in Wright (1856)
XWright, Thomas. Songs and Carols.
Warton Club 4. London: Richards, 1856, 109-114, 114-15. Cf. Opie and Opie (1951)
XIona Archibald Opie, and Peter Opie. The Oxford Dictionary of Nursery Rhymes. Oxford: Clarendon, 1951, 386.
